Articles.Content:
So, up until now the only "modding" i've actually done is create planets and such with Kopernicus and PF:CE and all of that great stuff.

BUT, i want to really learn how to make an actual mod that add's parts.I'm especially interested in how to make engines.

So if there is a tutorial out there, link me or you could just make a tutorial.It's all up to you .

Stickied in the Add-on Development forum: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE

There you'll find everything you need.
